SCENE_EXPRESS.TITLE: Scene Express
SCENE_EXPRESS.ENABLE_HINT: Control whether Scene Express is enabled or not.
SCENE_EXPRESS.FILE_EXISTS_BEHAVIOR_HINT: What to do when an image with the same name already exists.
SCENE_EXPRESS.IMMEDIATELY_ACTIVE_HINT: When dropping a single image, activates its scene immediately after creation.
SCENE_EXPRESS.UNHANDLED_IMAGE: File '{fileName}' is not a supported image.
